description: A crispy way to enjoy chicken with some mild spices.
name: Buttermilk Chicken On Brioche with Pickled Cucumber Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine a cracked and beaten egg with the buttermilk. Add all the herbs and spices to the bowl and combine fully.
Add the sliced chicken to the bowl and marinade fully, then cover the bowl with cling film and leave the mixture in the fridge overnight.
The next day, combine the flour, baking powder and cornstarch in a separate bowl. Take 4 tbs of the marinade from the fridge and combine it fully into the flour mixture.

Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Heat up a shallow fry pan to a medium heat. Take the marinated chicken and dip into the flour mixture ensuring all parts are covered evenly. Shallow fry the chicken, turning half way, for 5 minutes in total and then leave to one side.

Transfer the fried chicken to a suitable baking tray and bake for another 30 minutes or until fully cooked through. Remove from the heat and serve on brioche, pickled cucumber and your choice of sauce.
